value:
If I can do my part to help protect
someone I care about...if they're
smiling...who I am doesn't matter.

Azura and I were separated for far
too long... Finally, we can be together
here.

If I can do anything, please let me
know. There is no value to strength
unless you use it to help people.

To be able to fight alongside all of
these Heroes... This world itself might
be a dream.

As long as I can make Azura happy,
I am prepared to face any hardship.

I am glad to see you well. A greeting
from $Nf!

I want to see her smile—always. The
stronger I get, the better I can protect
her.

I will aim ever upward, and my
strength will become everyone's
rock.
I have disappointed you. I am sorry.
This feeling can't be a dream.

My name is Corrin. I am here to see
that Azura is smiling once again.

Some people find pleasure in
attacking those who can't fight back.
Sad to say, but it's true.$k$pAzura's heart has been wounded by
people like that. And as long as she
seeks revenge, it will never heal.$k$pThat is why I want to stay at her side.
If I protect her and give those
wounds time to heal...$k$pthen perhaps she can grow stronger
and find a way to live on her own
someday.$k$pI know she has the strength to walk
on her own two feet. She just has to
find it.$k$pUntil then, I will watch over her.
Always.
せいっ！
おやすみ
うああっ！
だめだ…
Time to sleep.
It's all for her!
Dreams offer hope.
Sweet dreams.
Guess I'll...turn in...
あはは
I want to bring a smile to Azura's face. She's so young... How can I neglect her?
You're willing to walk right up to people and say hello! I'm not shy either.
If things get too rough on you, it's OK to run away. Retreating isn't all bad.
A happy dream is better than a painful reality.
Do I...truly exist? Or am I just somebody else's dream?
Someday, she will take the first step on her path. There'll be no stopping her.
You're so kind. Something tells me you could bring that girl true happiness...
Morning!
Can't sleep?
I was dreaming...
